name: Die for me
nutshell: Su Keke, a super schoolmaster who only wants to learn, she then accidentally encounters a magic stick on the way home, turning her into a charming physique. Since then, life has undergone earth-shaking changes. Faced with all kinds of confession and pursuits every day, Su Keke just wants to scream and die! Die, everyone who loves me just die!

name: The Iron Road
nutshell:
Akiretasu is a skilled swordsman who gains fame in the Roman Colosseum. Boastful about his strength and status, he catches wind of rumors of a boy far stronger than him - one who slew seven tigers who hails from Japan. The boy, Takeru, happens to be journeying to Rome with a caravan of silk merchants. Akiretasu is intrigued, and sets out to meet him. Both take the same path - the road connecting East and West, the Silk Road!

Volume 74 of the Osamu Tezuka Complete Works

name: Onii-chan to Otouto-kun
nutshell: Yayoi Komatsu has liked her neighbor, the handsome university student Hideto Kaga, since they were little. But when his little brother Masato becomes the student-council president at her school, she takes an interest in him aswell. While Yayoi is trying to figure out which brother she likes best, Hideto suddenly asks her out…!

name: Shiro no Keiyaku
nutshell:
From Aerandria:
Shiro is a white crow. Because of his unusual color, he’s often bullied by the other black crows. One day, he’s hurt badly because the others ganged up on him, and he was saved by a girl. Moved by the girl’s gentle heart, Shiro asked a devil to let him turn into a human. However, there’s one condition: Shiro will have to do at least one bad deed a day, otherwise, his body will crumble. Can Shiro really fulfill this contract?

name: Heart Tsuranuite
nutshell: In a school where common students are mere pawns of the elite and must fight each other for the latter's entertainment, Shakunage, the crimson pawn, finds himself in a bind… and Hiragi, who despises the system, seems willing to help him out?

name: Yuri's bizarre adventure
nutshell: A Watamote oneshot based on Yuri and Emiri

name: Shuuake no Asa
nutshell: Author's Pixiv: https://www.pixiv.net/en/users/517249

name: Calming of the Heart
nutshell: A two-part oneshot about the story of a lonely god and a troubled high school girl.

name: The Plan for Being Gods
nutshell: Before the deification after the War of the Shang and the Zhou, Jiang Ziya fell asleep accidentally. One thousand years had passed when he woke up. To complete the deification, Jiang Ziya started looking for god-to-be in the modern world to once again fight with the enemies from a thousand years ago. The enemies were ready, but the modern gods were busy enjoying their lives and refused to be deities…

name: Door to Heaven
nutshell:
From Evil Flowers:
How many doors must you open before you can reach heaven? Is it after the next one, or the one after the next one?

name: Kimi to, Sekai ga Owaru made
nutshell:
Collection of short stories:


Kimi to, Sekai ga Owaru Made
The last email I received from Takashi was blank. I have been constantly wondering what the meaning of the blank email was that you sent to me when you were seriously injured in the accident…
The day that Natsume first met Takashi was on a summer like hot day. The two of them didn’t want to put their words into reality and only embraced each other without saying anything or asking anything. And what was it that Takashi wanted to send…!?


Natsu Oto


Kareshi na Kanojo


Yuki Machi no Koi
Ten years ago, Mayuki made a promise to Shuu that they would become lovers if it snows on Christmas Eve and since then she has been waiting patiently. Shuu on the other hand seems to have already forgotten about that promise…?

name: Saishuu Loop
nutshell:
Collection of four stories:

The final Loop
And that was you!
Watercolour Girl
Gorbatschow no Tane

name: Onajikakera de Dekite Iru
nutshell:
This is the peaceful suburban city of Yotsuba. In an apartment where local students gather, uniquely individual residents get in an uproar over something, and in a drag bar in a corner of the shopping district, customers with problems approach Mama* for love advice.
Poor student Asahi, saving up on apartment rent, has accepted Ootsuka's proposal: if he gets along with his lover Tsukimi, who lives in the floor above, his debt will be forgiven – however?
Passionate conflict unfolds between boys at a certain corner of the city, day and night.
A great compilation of funny, painful, happy stories, including pictures specifically drawn for the occasion.

name: Hunting Game
nutshell: “Teacher, I know your secret. The person you secretly love is my dad, right? If you want me to keep it a secret… be my lover.” That one sentence completely turned Ye Qing’s life upside down. When Ye Qing was 19, he harbored a secret crush on his tutor. 18 years later, the feelings he had been hiding were discovered by his tutor’s son. Face to face with the younger but more domineering man, Ye Qing had no choice but to play in his psychological games… (From Solstice Translations)

name: Miko Honey
nutshell: University student Shou started to work part-time as a Shrine Priest due to money problems, resulting in him becoming lovers with the shrine's heir, the overly serious Ouma.

name: Happiness Meal
nutshell:
A man relaxing with a can of beer when a winter storm hits. A man, burdened with personal strife, finds solace in a bowl of ramen.
Entirely textless, each chapter is a self-contained glimpse into the life of an ordinary person, and how the meals they eat lift their spirits.

name: The Dragon child
nutshell: Min, a girl who lives a poor life. One day, when she was watching the dragons flying in the sky, a dragon egg suddenly fell on her! However, a suspicious human in the army is aiming at the dragon...!?

name: Owari no Seraph - Kimi ga sukida to itta ao (Doujinshi)
nutshell: Yuuichiro Hyakuya x MIkaela Hyakuya

name: Osaka Expo (Azumanga Daioh 10th Anniversary Tribute)
nutshell: Tribute anthology for Azumanga's 10th anniversary, by various artists.

name: The Lone Necromancer
nutshell:
Seongwu is a former special forces soldier who has returned to college after completing his national service. His ordinary life as a student is shattered during class one day when he and his fellow students are faced with a mysterious prompt asking them to “select a role.” Seongwu chooses the necromancer, a rare ability that grants him the power to control the undead. With the campus and outside world seemingly on the brink of collapse, Seongwu must use his newfound powers to battle fearsome monsters and help save his fellow students. But will they make it out alive?



Official Simplified Chinese Translation


Official Indonesian Translation


Official French Translation

name: Phantasy Star III - Character Book
nutshell:
Phantasy Star III's Chief Character Designer Toyo Ozaki has published doujin books for the game.
This is the Phantasy Star III Character Book, with two versions existing. These books contain character sketches and original comics by her and her husband Masaki Segawa.

name: Mune-kyun Deka
nutshell: Sumeragi Kurumi is a rookie detective assigned to the Otowa Police Station of the Tokyo Metropolitan Police Department. Kurumi has a psychic ability that causes her chest to react when she comes in contact with a criminal, and she uses this ability to solve a variety of difficult cases. Each time a hard-hitting murder case or undercover investigation unfolds, Kurumi's sensuality as she finds herself in a dilemma will keep the readers hooked!

name: Touhai Minagoroshi-hen
nutshell: Its the 3rd part to the tohai series if you don't know what this series is about well its about Kei who you may think is just an average high school boy but in the mahjong underworld he is know as "Ice Cold K", a prodigy who wreaks havoc at high stakes parlors with his ruthless and calculating play style he one day met a man named Dojima, who teache him the true meaning of gambling and more of less kei's life got really crazy and that ant even the half of it

name: Durarara!! - Zero Distance Love (Doujinshi)
nutshell: Shizuo x Izaya

name: Touhou - Higan yuuwa (Doujinshi)
nutshell: A meeting of Gensokyo’s two parties that deal with deceased spirits, in Hero Bear’s usual cute style.

name: Down and Dirty
nutshell: How far (or low) can an attractive body take you in a slum? Pretty and well endowed, Choi Hyungdo scrapes together a living as a waiter by day and porn actor by night. He's occasionally called in for odd jobs at the male brothel where the charismatic owner, Lee Gyung, relentlessly tries to seduce him. Hyungdo feels as though he’s spiraling, but his attraction to Gyung feels as real as his imminent bankruptcy. The descent may be ruthless, but it's not without its pleasures.

name: The Jungle Kingdom
nutshell:
George and Mr. Sandwich go on location to film in the ruins of a kingdom in Africa that existed 3,000 years ago.
Also includes "The Secret Base of the Shari River": Frank Allen and his nephew John Holcan go in search of a golden statue located in the upper reaches of the Shari River.

Volume 138 of the Osamu Tezuka Complete Works

name: Shoku King
nutshell: A while ago, an amazing chef was sent packing for a mistake that he didn't commit. He promptly left the cooking world to the underground. Today, still shunned by the establishment, he survives as soldier of fortune. If you have a bad restaurant, if no one else can help, and if you can find him, maybe you can hire: THE Shoku king.

name: Seiketsu no Haguruma
nutshell:
Long ago, there existed two different groups of people. One had red blood and the other had blue blood. They co-existed peacefully, but eventually they started to hate each other and a war broke out.
The massive red blood army initially overwhelmed the blue blood but with the help of new technology developed by Kodo, the prince of the blue blood, the blue bloods were victorious. The new technology, called the Haguruma, is a powerful robot type machinery capable of devastating destruction.
As the red blood people were enslaved, Kodo saw what monstrosity his Haguruma was being used for. Helpless red blood people were being hunted down and murdered. Overwhelmed by guilt, Kodo rescued the refugee red bloods and refused to build any more machines. His father, the king, ordered him to be executed, but he barely escaped and now without a home, he must survive on his own.
Note: The scanlations used the web version of the chapters, which is 38 chapters long instead of 29 like some other sites report.

name: I Don't Know About It, So Please Teach Me!
nutshell: Madotsuki is bored so she tries to convince Poniko to join her in a rap group, but she finds Kamakura-ko instead and decides to teach her about it.
